name: Space Race - Real Endless Racing Flying Escape Games
name_original: Space Race - Real Endless Racing Flying Escape Games
description:
Welcome to the race of the future! Your mission is simple. Fly through the narrow corridors without getting fried by powerful laser beams or crashing into the tight air locks. To master this addictive simulator, you’ll need an eyesight of an eagle and reflexes of a cobra snake! As your elite pilot training progresses, you will be assigned with plenty of new missions, each of them requiring a different skill set. If you’re good enough you’ll be awarded with an access to the hangar, filled with brand new and awesome aircrafts. Try to find the one that suits you best, collect extra items and set a new record to prove that you’re a true Flying Ace!

Game features:
- super cool upbeat soundtrack
- stunning 3D graphics
- 100% free gameplay
- realistic physics
- 100s of miles of flying
- online leaderboard
